name: Ooze for the Ooze Gods
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 45: start with nothing!

Inspired by Katamari Damacy and Risk of Risk

  • WASD to move, and that's all
  • Digest almost everything the ooze touches
  • Difficulty increases as time grow
  • Get points for everything the ooze has consumed
  • Assimilate!
